name: 15 Puzzle Challenge
description:
Do you think you are smart enough??? Then try and win in the ultimate 15 Puzzle Challenge! Become the ONLY master of the classic puzzle game!

Invented more than 100 years ago this simple puzzle game remains popular among puzzle lovers around the world. The object of the puzzle is to place the numbered tiles in order in a 4x4 square by making sliding moves that use the empty space.

15 Puzzle Challenge is offering you great chance to refresh your skills in the well-known puzzle game. All of us used to play it once…but everything has changed since then. With 15 Puzzle Challenge you can play on your phone or tablet and compete against anyone around the globe. The competition is really tough and without the practice you won’t make it. Play more games, open all achievements and become #1!

Don’t forget to tell your friends how good you are - share your personal results on Facebook, Twitter or via email.

And remember “Once a winner, always a winner"!!!

Features:
• Challenging gameplay and classic look
• Unique Achievements
• Global Leaderboards
• Share your result on Facebook, Twitter or via email
